IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: Fire Company and Rescue Squad serving the surrounding communities in northwest Susquehanna and northeastern Bradford counties since 1955.
IRS990.MissionDesc: The Little Meadows Volunteer Fire Company and Rescue Squad provides fire and BLS ambulance services to the surrounding communities in northwest Susquehanna and northeast Bradford counties in Pennsylvania on a 100% volunteer basis. The station houses three fire apparatus and one ambulance and provides space for fundraising and food and shelter to the community during local natural disasters.
IRS990.Desc: Fire Company and Rescue Squad serving the surrounding communities in Northwest Susquehanna and Northeastern Bradford counties since 1955.
